round_best: Develop a generative adversarial network (GAN) architecture optimized for sparse 4D data by incorporating temporal coherence regularization. This method would use temporal gradients and smoothness constraints within the adversarial learning framework to enforce realistic time evolution in generated 4D outputs. Such a model could be pre-trained on available 3D datasets augmented with simulated time dimensions before fine-tuning on the scarce 4D data, enhancing its ability to generalize from limited examples.
